TextView.android:text: UNIT ITHE 8086 MICROPROGESSOR 9 lntroduction to 8086 - Microprocessor architecture - Addressing modes - lnstruction set and assembler directives - Assembly language programming - Modular Programming - Linking and Relocation - Stacks - Procedures - Macros - lnterrupts and interrupt service routines - Byte and String Manipulation.

UNIT II8086 SYSTEM BUS STRUCTURE 9 8086 signals - Basic configurations - System bus timing -System design using 8086 - lO prograriming - lntroductioh to Multiprogramming - System Bus Structure - Multiprocessor coniiguratioris - Coprocessor, Closely coupled and loosely Coupled configurations - lntroduction to advanced processors.

UNIT IIII/O INTERFACING 9 Memory lnterfacing and l/O interfacing - Parallel communication interface - Serial communication interfaie - D/A and A/D lnterface - Timer - Keyboard /display controller - lnterrupt controller - DMA controller - Programming and applications Case studies: Traffic Light control, LED display , LCD display, Keyboard display interface and Alarm Controller.
UNIT IV MIGROCONTROLLER 9 Architecture of g051 - Special Function Registers(SFRs) - l/O Pins Ports and Circuits - lnstruction set - Addressing modes - Assembly language programming.

UNIT V INTERFACING MICROCONTROLLER 9 programming 8051 Timers - Serial Port Programming - lnterrupts Programming - LqD & Keyboard lntei-facing -iOC, DAC & Sensor lnterfacing - External Memory lnterface- Stepper Motor and Waveform generation. TOTAL:45 PERIODS
